Name: Finders Reapers
About the game: Earn your stars in the single-player missions, unlocking all-new characters as you progress. Try your hand at EIGHT different game modes; from the all new ‘Collect ‘Em Up’ to the more familiar ‘Deathmatch’ and ‘Last Man Standing’ modes. Take the fight online and show the world who is the best. Brace for the vivid colours and gameplay of the exciting locations - travel from the dusty Farm to the dominating City, the pirate bay to the war-torn outskirts and much more. Featuring over 200 characters to unlock through play and purchase. 50 taunts to unleash your inner victory. Upgrade your arsenal; with the Rifle, Shotgun and Rocket Launcher hidden in the world. Fully featured tutorial to help learn the ropes.
